Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With everyone making such a fuss about
those <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, I'm glad to see a young
lad like you visit my humble arrow shop.
You must be a fine archer!


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> had more archers like
you, then maybe things wouldn't have
happened...like they did...
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You have the look of an archer, young lad.


Why, lookin' at you reminds me of my
husband. There was a time he was a
master of the bow...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now he's left the village with our former
chief. Truthfully, it's been so long since
I've seen him, I can barely recall his face.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, sorry. Look at me, goin' on and on.
Back to business.

If you find yourself short on funds, you
just sell me what you don't need. Don't
be shy, now.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even though the rest of town is fussin'
about those <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, you stayed up
late to visit the arrow shop?
That's some dedication to the bow.
You've made my night, kid!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even though the rest of town is fussin'
about those <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, you're spending
the evening at the arrow shop?
That's my kind of enthusiasm, kid!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even though the rest of town is fussin'
about those <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, you're shopping
for arrows? <sp:5:1:0>That's some dedication!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you headin' out? Heh, the energy
of youth...

It's a good time to find materials, but
keep an eye out for monsters, ya hear?
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I sure am glad when you stop by, kid.
Folks just don't appreciate a good
arrow anymore.
You keep on stopping by, even if it's just
to sell. Got it?
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you want to hear about my hometown,
I can talk your ear off!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> is a small fishing town on
the <clr:0000>southeastern coast<clr:ffff>.

It may be out of the way, but it has <clr:0000>shops
and such you'll find only there<clr:ffff>. Our
village is a lovely place.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But then...<sp:5:0:0>it was seized by <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>, and
everyone had to abandon the village. The
villagers are scattered all over now.
The leader of the village is desperate to
save <clr:0000>Lurelin<clr:ffff>, but...<sp:5:0:0>who knows what'll
happen?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry, sorry! I didn't mean to take us in
such dark directions.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>No helping it. Now then, back to work!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Well, well... Never seen something like
that before. Sorry, kid, I can't buy that.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Seein' someone look at these arrows
reminds me of my husband. There was a
time he was a regular master archer.
I wonder where he is now...
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I like a good sale, but I won't buy it right
off of ya. Take it off, first!
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> had more archers like
you, then maybe things wouldn't have
happened...like they did...
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Sakes alive!<sp:5:1:0> The pirates?<sp:5:1:0> Chased off?
By you?!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sure enough, I knew at first glance you
were a top-notch archer!

To you, Lurelin may just be a small fishing
village, but to me it'll always be my dear
hometown. I...I can't thank you enough.
The world seems just a little brighter!
I can finally breathe easy.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>With all the tourists overrunning the town,
I thought I'd get some more business.
But you're my only customer.
Maybe I need a signature souvenir, like
little Koko's ring garlands...
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Knowin' Lurelin Village is safe, I...
Thank you.
Talk1026:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Some days, I can almost hear my husband's voice...
Like he's just a room away...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>...But even with all the tourists around
town, no one's coming in. You're my
only customer.
Maybe I need a signature souvenir, like
little Koko's ring garlands...
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0100>I can still buy stuff from you...
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Oh my. I didn't think you'd go straight for
the <clr:0000>Aerocuda eyeball<clr:ffff>, kid. You've got a
discerning eye!<sp:0:4:0>They're supposed to make it <clr:0000>easier to hit
a target<clr:ffff> if you attach one to an arrow, so
they're one of our best sellers.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But sorry, I didn't mean to interrupt you
while you were shopping.
Com_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Look at this collection of yours!
What'll ya sell me?
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0100>You've got some quality goods here, kid!
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's an <clr:0000>Aerocuda wing<clr:ffff>, which we just
started stocking recently.<sp:0:4:0>It's popular with hunters, since attaching
it to an arrow <clr:0000>makes the arrow fly farther<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>So popular, in fact, that I recommend
buying it now. You never know when we
might sell out.
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Oh, did you change your mind?<sp:5:0:0> Well,
that's the way it goes.
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Would you believe it—I was just thinking
about picking this up!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>My, my! Eager, aren't we? I'll be sure to
keep those stocked for you.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'd LIKE to give you a discount, but with
my husband helping Lady Impa, who
knows when he'll start pulling his weight.
If you can't afford it, just walk away.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Kid...<sp:5:0:0>that pouch of yours is filled to
bursting. <sp:5:0:0>Come back when you've made
some room.
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You have the look of an archer, young lad.


Why, lookin' at you reminds me of my
husband. There was a time he was a
master of the bow...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>He recently left the village with our
former chief, though I heard he's
now returned.
<snd:Sad_01>Truthfully, it's been so long since I've
seen him, I can barely recall his face.
If he is back, you'd think he'd come by...<sp:5:2:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, sorry. Look at me, goin' on and on.
Back to business.

If you find yourself short on funds, you
just sell me what you don't need. Don't
be shy, now.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Once a fool, always a fool!<sp:5:1:0> If he doesn't have a
place to stay, he should come straight to m—<sp:5:1:0> Hm?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, um, welcome!
